Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with good, quiet location”
Reviews.Author: Satans7thBride
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 nights basic single beds bathroom pretty decent clean staff speak english helpful friendly located quiet neighborhood short walk metro complaint theres ac absolute killer summer avoid hotel hotter months apart hotel price stay july lol
